hero.title: Top Training TO
hero.description: At Resala, we believe that education is a lifelong journey. Our carefully crafted courses are designed to provide you with hands-on experience, practical knowledge, and the skills necessary to stand out in today's competitive world. Whether you’re looking to boost your career, change your profession, or simply explore something new, we have the right course for you.

header.title: Explore Our Categories
header.description: Discover a range of courses designed to help you master new skills, from programming to business.

programming.title: Programming
programming.desc: Delve into the world of coding with hands-on programming courses.

language.title: Language
language.desc: Learn new languages from the comfort of your home.

accounting.title: Accounting
accounting.desc: Master the art of financial management and accounting principles.

business.title: Business
business.desc: Enhance your skills in leadership and team management.

footer.description: Start your journey towards mastering new skills today!
